name: Tom Brady
description: Thomas Edward Patrick Brady Jr. (born August 3, 1977) is an American football quarterback for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the National Football League (NFL)

name: Quokka
description: The quokka (Setonix brachyurus, /ˈkwɒkə/),[4] also known as the short-tailed scrub wallaby, is a small macropod about the size of a domestic cat.
